transcript.speaker: John Smith
transcript.text: Good morning everyone, let's start the daily standup.

transcript.speaker: Sarah Johnson
transcript.text: Yesterday I completed the authentication feature. Today I'll continue with the API integration.

transcript.speaker: Mike Chen
transcript.text: I'm blocked on the database schema review. Need approval from the DBA team.

transcript.speaker: John Smith
transcript.text: Okay, I'll reach out to the DBA team for you. Sarah, great progress on auth!

transcript.speaker: Sarah Johnson
transcript.text: Thanks! I should have the API integration done by end of day.

transcript.speaker: Mike Chen
transcript.text: Once I get schema approval, I can start on the data migration scripts.

transcript.speaker: John Smith
transcript.text: Perfect. Any other blockers? No? Alright, let's get back to work!
